title: Sproutworks - Huashan Rd
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Multiple locations offering a salad bar plus soups and sandwiches. Items are labeled if vegetarian, vegan, contain nuts, etc., and staff can tell you what's gluten-free. Beverages include juices, flavored iced teas, and lemonades. Uses eco-friendly plates and cutlery. This outlet opened in 2015.
